entry.title: My self-taught journey to becoming a Software Engineer
entry.summary: I hold an undergraduate degree, but not in Computer Science. Ever since the first time I saw a computer, I've been fascinated and obsessed. My curiosity is what ultimately led to my career as a Software Engineer.

entry.title: My thoughts on coding interviews
entry.summary:
Let me start off by saying I am just plain bad at coding interviews. Some people are fast on their feet and others need more time to think. I need more time to think.

Coding interviews are a way to eliminate lots of candidates when a ton have applied. They are; however, in no way representative of actual day to day work.

entry.title: My experience being a lead
